about_the_game:
VirtualSociety is a multiplayer sandbox game where you can create anything, from your own cozy little room to an entire universe. Create unique characters and let them live unforgettable experiences. Everything made in a really cute hand-painted art-style.

Main features

  • Multiplayer: Invite your friends and family

  • In-depth game editor: Create everything you can dream of

  • For you: Designed with your mental health in mind

VirtualSociety is much more than just a game – it’s your creative and welcoming escape! Imagine a world where you can customize everything, from buildings to landscapes, while sharing your creations with a warm community. Whether you play alone or with friends, every moment is designed to make you feel comfortable and included, no matter who you are. The coolest part? You learn while having fun! Manage your stress or overcome your fears, all within a cozy universe that adapts to your own pace. Join the adventure and be part of something truly special!

Are you scared of spiders while your daughter is fascinated by them? Progress at your own pace in a safe space where you remain in control, gently and securely.

Are the little worries of everyday life weighing you down? Dive into a soothing world where you can build the garden of your dreams and regain your peace of mind.

Passionate about trains but stressed out by the frenzy of train stations? Practice from the comfort of your living room in a calm and welcoming virtual station.

Our mission: mental health support with no barrier and no stigma

In a world where stress and anxiety are omnipresent, VirtualSociety offers a soothing and innovative solution to help you regain calm and serenity. Thanks to its welcoming and secure environment, the game allows players to explore stress management mechanisms at their own pace. If you need a break from daily pressures, VirtualSociety offers a unique comfort zone to reconnect with yourself.

With progressive and safe gameplay, VirtualSociety enables you to overcome everyday fears, such as the fear of spiders or crowds. By creating tailored virtual environments, you can desensitize these phobias at your own pace and without pressure. Every step you take is under your control, within a supportive and welcoming setting, allowing you to face your fears gently and safely.

VirtualSociety is more than just fun; it is also a powerful tool for personal development. Whether it’s learning new skills like game programming or managing collaborative projects, or adopting new routines, you can thrive while being entertained. Explore new passions, boost your self-confidence, and take initiative in a world that values creativity and discovery.

Join us, and together, let's create the worlds of VirtualSociety!
